name: Cats and Cleaning
description:
"VR-C&C" Vacuum Robot - Cats & Cleaning is a simple 2D shooter. Can the robot manage to vacuum all dust before the cats drain its battery?


Controls

WASD tank controls.

Space to turbo.

Right mouse to shoot toy mice to distract cats.

1 & 2 to load levels. 

Levels

Apartment - Dust accumulates over time and cats spawn dust. Collect enough before it becomes to dirty.

Hotel - A set amount of dust, collect all to win. Cats do not spawn dust.

Music

A microtonal piece written by me for the game.
